data.name: Alejandro Batres
data.bio:
Some people call me 'Ralex' or 'Batres'. I'm 25 years old and graduated with a degree in Computer Science Engineering from BUAP. I'm a software developer who enjoys working on software projects and likes creating videogame-based content on the internet.

I have experience as a developer in programming languages such as C, C++, Java, Python, and currently JavaScript, mostly aiming at desktop applications (although I use Java at work). I like to create web applications and I want to dive into videogame development.

My hobbies revolve around videogames (totally unexpected). That is, I like to play videogames, consume and create videogame content, and even listen to videogame music.

I've also done internet content with friends since I like to create multimedia content such as videos.
